1.desc: The milonga just opened and you have to get dancers on the floor and get them moving. You want to build their energy towards your first milonga but not overdo it.
1.goal: Create a super tanda to get dancers on the floor and mixing.

2.desc: The floor is mixing well. More intermediate level dancers are on the floor and the advanced dancers are starting to show up.
2.goal: Build a super tanda to your second milonga tanda

3.desc: It's time to give the intermediate and advanced dancers things to explore and express. Most of the beginners have left.
3.goal: Build a super tanda towards your 3rd (final) milonga tanda.

4.desc: The space has opened up more and the advanced dancers want something memorable.
4.goal: Build a super tanda to close your event.
